text: Kenneth George Douglas (15 November 1935 â€“ 14 September 2022) was a New Zealand trade union leader. Douglas was born in Wellington, New Zealand. In the 1999 New Year Honours, Douglas was appointed a Member of the Order of New Zealand (ONZ). Douglas died in Wellington on 14 September 2022, aged 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand activists Category:Trade unionists Category:People from Wellington
title: Ken Douglas
